Package millionaire

Class FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES

java.lang.Object
millionaire.FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES
public abstract class FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a container to all global variables and it's include other classes (nested classes).
This way used to make it easier to understand instead of sending unrelated value.
This class is used in different places of this application so make sure that you understand the purpose of this class before using it or editing a part of this application.
Author:
Mohammad, Jesse, Henrik.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.LifeLineType
    This class stores the name of the lifelines.
    static class  FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.OptionButtonState
    It stores all possible option button states.
    Every variable name describe the purpose of creating it.
    static class  FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.QuestionPart
    It stores all possible question parts like the question text and its options (alternatives) and the order of the shown question.
    Every variable name describe the purpose of creating it.
    static class  FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.SoundEffectName
    This class stores the names of the different soundeffects.
